title: Print, "Arch of Septimius Severus from "Vedute di Roma"", 1759
creditline: Gift of the Estate of Mrs. George Pendleton
description: Horizontal Rectangle. Arch of Septimus Severus in center at mid-distance. Right: the church, SS Martina e Lucca; left foreground, column of PHOCAS; lower right, "Piranesi Architetto fec. "; title, in center; text along left margin: "Erario antic ... al campidoglio". Lower right: "Presso l'autore a Strada Felice...a paoli due e mezzo".

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Arch of Septimius Severus from "Vedute di Roma"", 1759.
1759. Etching. Gift of the Estate of Mrs. George Pendleton. 1939-9-2.
